mapper.select: select A.iboard,A.title,A.ctnt,B.nm writer, A.created_at createdAt, A.updated_at updatedAt from t_board A inner join t_user B on A.iuser = B.iuser order by iboard desc
select A.iboard,A.title,A.ctnt,B.nm writer, A.created_at createdAt, A.updated_at updatedAt from t_board A inner join t_user B on A.iuser = B.iuser where iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.update: update t_board set title = #{title}, ctnt = #{ctnt}, writer = #{writer}, updated_at = now() where iboard = #{iboard}
